column1: I used  Pool over weekend as it is newly introduced in Melbourne claims to be 70% cheaper than usual version. It is quite a good product if you’re on a tight budget but drivers don’t seem keen on it
column2: one time I used it I had to walk to pick up location about 15mins then wait a further 15mins for car to arrive
column3: driver refuses to cross T junction of traffic lights to get to me (although he clearly knew it me as I only one at sidewalk waving at him).+3

column1: All   drivers "TRACEABLE"....For your info,   should can get hold any driver at any time (or can lock them out if have issues with them)!! To read some of issues raised in this forum seems a little far-fetched or   is not being "Fair"... My opinion is to get these "dodgy" drivers identified boot them out of  ...gives us a bad name...+3
I got charged a cancellation fee when I had thought I'd requested a driver at a certain time. It my first time using service
column2: I selected time window then pickup drop off locations. But then I got a message telling me where 3 drivers were
column3: not thinking anything of it went about getting ready until driver called. So needed to cancel. When I tried to book by destinations first choose car then booking window got an error message. So in end I booked it Just in time. There any story...+3

column1: I booked one for transport to Melb airport. Tracker described car that on its way. Then info changed to another car supposedly because it closer - tho tracker said it further away. This meant pick-up time would be on far edge of requested pick-up time. A few minutes later tracker said that car had also canceled trying to find another driver. TRYING TO FIND ANOTHER DRIVER!?! YOU HAVE ONE JOB!! Fortunately
column2: another car came only a few minutes late made great time I had allowed lots of extra time so it ended up ok (the driver I had great;.as previous one even tho he got lost due to traffic works) but it may not have. If you're pressed for time

column1: I have been   rider for past year i used it daily. I have noticed there prices has gone so high that there's not much difference in cab ride anymore. Its very disappointing how you guys keep doing that. also drivers not very aware of location which make us pay even more than we expected. I started using   because it fast affordable convenient but now its not same.One valued customer lost. Will not order   anymore.+3
